entry.em: ..WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM CDT TUESDAY

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
WINDY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
WINDY WITH LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTHEAST WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
